project_path.coalPhoenixToken: contracts/Coalphoenix Full Smart Contract Security Audit/coalPhoenixToken

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The function excludeFromFee() uses a loop to exclude multiple addresses from the fee, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long list of addresses.
